overview:
“Casmir also known as CasMercedes,

Casmercedes is a Writer/Artist, Videographer/DJ

Hosting DCCRadio both on BlogtalkRadio/UStream

Casmercedes presence is commanding and she

Invites the crowd to get into the performance

Artfully and the music helps to fuel the flame.

Casmercedes EP Debuts Hosted by Sharkula

7/4/12 K-Day (Independence Day)

formally titled kkk(dope chic city vol.2)

Casmercedes sound is deep and full of intricate sound-scapes.”

Casmercedes is an Artist that writes, produces, and creates art. Casmercedes uses a variety of subversive tactics juxtaposed politically to The Guerilla Girls, conceptually to Suicide Girls. “Casmercedes, took the stage… actually a fabulous rap artist. She’s part of a group called Dope Chic and can be found @DCCRadio Casmercedes and this group are famous around the country. She is a great artist.”
